info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.cached_collection

Class CachedCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.cached_collection.CachedCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICachedCollection

    public class CachedCollection
extends Object
implements ICachedCollection
    Implementation of cached collection ICachedCollection Resolves IDatabaseTasks for each type of operations, constructs queries for task's prepare() method, sets connection from pool to task and executes it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CachedCollection(info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.iobject.IObject config)
      Constructor which initializes database tasks for db operations and connection pool for them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.iobject.IObject message)
      Deletes object from cache and set active flag to false for object into DB.
      List<info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.iobject.IObject> getItems(String key)
      Looks for value by key inside cache, if cache doesn't return any result, collection resolves search task and constructs query for it.
      void upsert(info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.iobject.IObject message)
      Adds or updates object into cache and into DB.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CachedCollection

        public CachedCollection(info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.iobject.IObject config)
                 throws info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.invalid_argument_exception.InvalidArgumentException
        Constructor which initializes database tasks for db operations and connection pool for them.
        Parameters:
        config - configuration object with collection settings and pool. Contains { "сollectionName": "name of database collection", "connectionPool": "pool with connection objects needed for database tasks", "keyName": "name of field which stores key value into document" }
        Throws:
        info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.invalid_argument_exception.InvalidArgumentException - Except when actor can't be created with @config

    • Method Detail

      • getItems

        public List<info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.iobject.IObject> getItems(String key)
                                                                 throws GetCacheItemException
        Looks for value by key inside cache, if cache doesn't return any result, collection resolves search task and constructs query for it. Query contains: { "collectionName": "current collection name", "keyName": "name of field which stores key value into document", "keyValue": "cache key value for search" } Found object from DB would be saved into cache
        Specified by:
        getItems in interface ICachedCollection
        Parameters:
        key - for cache. Cache should store needed value by this string.
        Returns:
        list with found objects
        Throws:
        GetCacheItemException - if any errors occurred

      • delete

        public void delete(info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.iobject.IObject message)
            throws DeleteCacheItemException
        Deletes object from cache and set active flag to false for object into DB. Query object for task contains: { "collectionName": "current collection name", "document": {iobject from message parameter} }
        Specified by:
        delete in interface ICachedCollection
        Parameters:
        message - document for delete
        Throws:
        DeleteCacheItemException

      • upsert

        public void upsert(info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.iobject.IObject message)
            throws UpsertCacheItemException
        Adds or updates object into cache and into DB. Query object for task contains: { "collectionName": "current collection name", "document": {iobject from message parameter} }
        Specified by:
        upsert in interface ICachedCollection
        Parameters:
        message - document for upsert
        Throws:
        UpsertCacheItemException
